control.description-key: Fix chat auto-save with isChatDirty flag (v1.2.24)

property.name: analysisId
property.description-key: GUID of the sprk_analysis record (without curly braces)

property.name: documentId
property.description-key: GUID of the parent sprk_document record (optional - auto-fetched from Analysis record)

property.name: containerId
property.description-key: SharePoint Embedded Container ID for file access

property.name: fileId
property.description-key: SharePoint Embedded File ID for source document preview

property.name: apiBaseUrl
property.description-key: Base URL for BFF API (from sprk_BffApiBaseUrl environment variable)

property.name: tenantId
property.description-key: Azure AD Tenant ID for MSAL authentication

property.name: clientAppId
property.description-key: PCF Client Application ID registered in Azure AD

property.name: bffAppId
property.description-key: BFF API Application ID for scope construction (api://{bffAppId}/SDAP.Access)

property.name: workingDocumentContent
property.description-key: Current content of the working document (Markdown)

property.name: analysisStatus
property.description-key: Current status: Draft, InProgress, Completed, Failed
